   Now scan tasks keep their originating fragment alive, removing the need for applications to track the mapping themselves.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: This is generally useful for debugging and tracing ScanTasks, and can be used to remove the [explicit mapping in FileSystemDataset::Write|https://github.com/michalursa/arrow/commit/ae396b9d4c26621cba2cce955f1d55f43e8faab9#diff-2caf4e9bd3f139e05e55dca80725d8a9c436f5ccf65c76a37cebfa6ee9b36a6aR278]
fields.summary: [C++][Dataset] Expose originating fragment as a property of ScanTask

comments.body: This would implicitly introduce a guarantee that scan tasks keep their fragments alive
